# edmar.sh llms.txt

> Showcasing Ed Marsh's expertise in technical writing, content strategy, and community building, while offering services to enhance organizational content practices.

- [Ed Marsh Portfolio & Overview](https://edmar.sh): Showcasing Ed Marsh's expertise in technical writing, content strategy, and community building.
- [Contact Ed Marsh](https://edmar.sh/contact/): Facilitates discussions on content strategy and mentorship.
- [About Ed Marsh](https://edmar.sh/about/about-ed-marsh/): Ed Marsh's background in technical communication and community engagement.

## Podcasts

- [Podcast: Curse of Knowledge with Tom Johnson](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-4-curse-of-knowledge-with-tom-johnson/): Technical communication insights with Tom Johnson.
- [Podcast: Tim Esposito on Volunteerism](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/price-right-tim-esposito-content-content-podcast-episode-20/): Tim Esposito’s career, volunteerism, and personal interests.
- [Podcast: Project Management with Viqui Dill](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/were-gonna-do-this-together-with-viqui-dill-content-content-podcast/): Project management and technical writing experiences.
- [Podcast: Introverted Leadership with Ben Woelk](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/off-wall-presentations-featuring-ben-woelk-content-content-podcast-episode-11/): Leadership insights for introverts.
- [Podcast: Content Strategy with Ann Rockley](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/sink-and-swim-situation-with-ann-rockley-content-content-podcast/): Content strategy insights from Ann Rockley.
- [Podcast: Noz Urbina on Content Strategy](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/1000-or-100000-meetings-with-noz-urbina-content-content-podcast/): Content strategy insights and career stories.
- [Podcast: Alan Houser on Technical Communication](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-time-as-a-tool-featuring-alan-houser-episode-2/): Technical communication topics with Alan Houser.
- [Podcast: Emotive Analytics with Allie Proff](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/emo-analytics-with-allie-proff-content-content-episode-17/): Emotive analytics and technical storytelling.
- [Podcast: Content, Music, and Single Sourcing with Scott Abel](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/i-have-issues-with-slide-decks-with-scott-abel-content-content-podcast/): Content strategy and music.
- [Podcast: Localization with Bill Swallow](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/local-needs-content-featuring-bill-swallow-content-content-podcast-episode-12/): Localization and content strategy.
- [Podcast: Conference Experiences with Hannah Kirk](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/fluffy-experience-with-hannah-kirk-content-content-podcast/): Conference experiences and technology.
- [Podcast: Michael Miller on Tech Writing](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/four-engineers-and-an-english-major-with-michael-miller-content-content-podcast/): Technical writing insights from Michael Miller.
- [Podcast: Tech Comm Evolution with Patrick Bosek](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/a-really-fancy-webform-with-patrick-bosek-content-content-podcast/): Tech communication with Patrick Bosek.
- [Podcast: Tech Comm in Poland with Pawel Kowaluk](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/like-thomas-pynchon-pawel-kowaluk-content-content-episode-16/): Technical communication in Poland.
- [Podcast: Career Insights with Jack Molisani](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/users-or-people-with-jack-molisani-content-content-episode-15/): Career insights in technical communication.
- [Podcast: Content Creation with David Dylan Thomas](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-7-curious-about-content-featuring-david-dylan-thomas/): Content strategy insights.
- [Podcast Series Index](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/): Interviews with professionals in technical communication.
- [Podcast: UX Writing with MJ Babic](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/clarity-over-consistency-with-mj-babic-content-content-podcast/): UX writing insights.
- [Podcast: Bernard Aschwanden on Content Strategy](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-10-featuring-bernard-aschwanden/): Content strategies in technical documentation.
- [Podcast: Andrea Ames on Tech Comm Value](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/installation-not-user-task-featuring-andrea-ames-content-content-podcast-episode-21/): Evolution and value of technical communication.
- [Podcast: Sean Heckman on Racing Content](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/holding-somebody-elses-place-with-sean-heckman-content-content-podcast/): Sean Heckman’s racing and content creation.
- [Podcast: Career Growth with Alisa Bonsignore](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/all-the-things-in-my-venn-diagram-with-alisa-bonsignore-content-content-podcast/): Career insights and growth mindset.
- [Podcast: Structured Authoring with Liz Fraley](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/same-mess-different-tools-with-liz-fraley-content-content-episode-19/): Evolution of technical writing.
- [Podcast: Intelligent Content with Cruce Saunders](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/experiences-have-to-be-assembled-with-cruce-saunders-content-content-podcast/): Building assets in enterprise environments.
- [Podcast: Sarah O’Keefe on Content Strategy](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-8-fairly-random-events-featuring-sarah-okeefe/): Content strategy experiences.
- [Podcast: Marcia Riefer Johnston on Content Marketing](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-5-undefinable-me-featuring-marcia-riefer-johnston/): Content marketing and writing.
- [Podcast: Sharon Burton and Podcast Launch](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/introducing-the-content-content-podcast/): Podcast launch and customer experience.
- [Podcast: Keith Schengili-Roberts on DITA](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/i-can-eat-glass-with-keith-schengili-roberts-content-content-podcast-episode-22/): Technology and DITA evangelism.
- [Podcast: Teresa Meek on Content Marketing](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/napoleons-shakespeares-teresa-meek-content-content-podcast-14/): Content marketing insights.
- [Podcast: Danielle Villegas on Tech Comm](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-fire-fingers-featuring-danielle-villegas-episode-3/): Technical communication and management.
- [Podcast: Sara Feldman on Value-Oriented Outcomes](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/value-oriented-outcomes-with-sara-feldman-content-content-podcast/): Customer success strategies and job hunting.
- [Podcast: Dr. Carlos Evia on Tech Comm & DITA](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/content-content-podcast-episode-6-wheres-my-flare-featuring-dr-carlos-evia/): DITA developments.
- [Podcast: Todd DeLuca on Career Elevation](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/complimentary-sandwich-featuring-todd-deluca-content-content-episode-9/): Volunteering and team management.
- [Podcast: Phylise Banner on eLearning](https://edmar.sh/podcasts/i-like-the-ms-with-phylise-banner-content-content-podcast/): eLearning and education theory.

## Content Strategy, Skills & Documentation

- [Content & Community Skills Overview](https://edmar.sh/skills/): Content creation, community building, content strategy.
- [Technical Writing Best Practices](https://edmar.sh/skills/technical-writing/): Best practices for effective technical documentation.
- [Content Metrics and Analytics](https://edmar.sh/skills/metrics/): Improving content performance through analytics.
- [Community Building for Content](https://edmar.sh/skills/community/): Community engagement for technical content.
- [Information Architecture Guidance](https://edmar.sh/skills/information-architecture/): Enhancing content structure and user experience.
- [Project Management for Content](https://edmar.sh/skills/project-management/): Project management skills for content projects.
- [Content Strategy Consulting](https://edmar.sh/skills/content-strategy/): Improving organizational content effectiveness.
- [Podcasting Experience](https://edmar.sh/skills/podcasting/): Podcasting in technical communication.
- [Coding & Technical Content Development](https://edmar.sh/skills/code-development/): Coding experience and technical content projects.

## Static Site & AI Documentation

- [Content Strategy for Static Site Generators](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/content-strategy-for-ssgs/): Strategy for static site content.
- [Static Site Transformation Journey](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/): Insights on migrating to a static site generator.
- [AI Documentation Showcase](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/ai-doc-output/): AI-generated documentation for Ed Marsh’s static website.
- [AI Documentation Output (Original)](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/ai-doc-output-orig/): Documentation of static site implementation using Eleventy, Tailwind CSS, and Nunjucks.
- [AI in Technical Writing](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/writing-with-ai/): AI’s role in technical documentation.
- [Choosing a Static Site Generator](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/choosing-static-site-generator/): Guide to selecting a static site generator.
- [Static Site Transformation – Motivation](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/why/): Motivations and goals for static site transformation.
